(vi)  
IAUED accepts 'O' level credit in English Language, 
relevant subject of specialization and three (3) other 
Arts subjects.  
RSUST - As in Education and Chemistry.  
BENIN requires Physics and any of AgriculturalScience 
orGeography/Physics and Mathematics.  
UYO does not require 'O' level credit pass in Physics.  
TASUED requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes at one 
(1) sitting or six (6) 'O' level credit passes at two (2) 
sittings including Biology, Chemistry, English Language 
and Mathematics  
    (v)    OAU requires five (5)'O’ level credit passes or five (5) 
merit/credit at TC II. Including English Language, 
Mathematics and two (2) of Biology, Chemistry, 
Physics, General Science and Agricultural Science.  
    (vi)   MAKURDI  requires  credit  passes  in  Further  
Mathematics, Technical Drawing or Physics.   
    (vii)    LAGOSrequires 'O' levelcredit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and any 
one (1) of Agricultural Science, Integrated Science, 
Fisheries/Animal Husbandry.  
    (vi)    
  
AAUA requires five (5)‘O’ level credit passes which 
must include English Language, Mathematics, Biology, 
Chemistry and one (1) other subject.  
    UTME 
(i)   SUBJECTS  
IAUED requires subject of specialization, one (1) Arts 
subject and any other subject.  
    (ii)  DELSU requires Chemistry, Biology and one (1) other 
Science subject.  
    (iii)  LAGOS requires English Language, Mathematics and 
any two (2) of Chemistry, Physics, Biology and 
Agricultural Science.  
    (iv)  UYO accepts any two (2) Science subjects.  
    (V)  BENIN  requires  Biology,  Chemistry,  Physics/ 
Mathematics.
